mapper.insert: insert into user (user_name, account, password, phone, email, sex, user_type, create_time) values (#{user_name}, #{account}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{user_type}, #{create_time})
mapper.update: update user set user_name=#{user_name}, account=#{account}, password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, sex=#{sex}, user_type=#{user_type} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from user where account=#{account} and password=#{password}
